title: StacksTokenBSC
author: StacksTokenBSC
content: Introducing STACKS ($STACKS) - Your Path to Passive Income by banking on the Binance Smart Chain!Launched: 7/4/2023Are you ready to join the future of decentralized banking? Discover STACKS, the innovative store of value on the Binance Smart Chain that's soon to reshape the DeFi landscape. Say goodbye to traditional banking and hello to automatic rewards and passive income!Key Features:Decentralized Banking: STACKS aims to revolutionize the way we bank by providing automatic rewards based on transaction volume. Holders earn passive income that's both rewarding and accessible for immediate use while also being an asset that values its liquidity. Additionally, STACKS hopes to be a revolution in helping families send and receive cross border remittances in the future!Take Profits: Unlike staking for a network, STACKS' reward system is investor-centric. Stack up your earnings while retaining your STACKS holdings to keep benefiting from ongoing BNB rewards. The power is in your hands to "take profits" in real time and stack on your terms.Token Details:Ticker: $STACKSContract: 0x14220f5893e945EeD36389905b991d6b972e04f0Asset Type: BRC-20 token on Binance Smart ChainUtility: Store of value offering automatic passive income rewards in the form of BNB directly to its holders' wallets.Dex Listing: PancakeSwapTokenomics:3% buy and sell tax:Rewards: 1.5% of transaction volume distributed as PASSIVE INCOME in BNB to holders.Liquidity Injection: 0.5% of all transactions used for automatic LIQUIDITY injection to ensure stability.True Burn Mechanism: 0.5% of transactions subjected to a unique TRUE BURN mechanism to create a deflationary system, increasing scarcity and value with every transaction. These tokens aren't just sent to a dead wallet, they're deleted from all existence, forever, and this reflects in real time on the supply.Developer Wallet: 0.5% of transactions is TRANSPARENTLY allocated for development costs, marketing efforts, and developer compensation. No hidden developer wallets to dump in the middle of the night here, and they only get this through the shared success of STACKS with the investors.Founding Principles:STACKS is built on the principles of honesty, transparency, and community focus. The team's expertise in blockchain technology, combined with a dedication to ethical development, sets STACKS apart as a DeFi project of greatness. Trustlessness and trustworthiness are one in the same with STACKS.Join the Revolution:STACKS is your gateway to a store of value and a decentralized banking experience like no other. With robust security and low transaction fees on the Binance Smart Chain, STACKS welcomes users from around the world to its ecosystem, making banking better for everyone.Ready to embrace the future?View our White Paper for a more in-depth look: https://stackbnb.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/STACKS-WHITE-PAPER-V1.0-RELEASE.pdfWebsite: https://StackBNB.comTG: t.me/StacksTokenBSC Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/StacksTokenBSC/Email: dev@stackbnb.com

comments.author: SinarOrphan
comments.body: Whitepaper is actually pretty legit. Will be keeping an eye on this one

comments.author: TravelFoxx
comments.body: This one may just be the Altcoin for the future.Check out the whitepaper, detailed enough to not be too much to read, covers everything you really want to know
